Player History
Drafted in 32nd round, 500th overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Injured on 9/13/2016 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 5/24/2017 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 8-9 weeks...
Earned first career win on 8/11/2017...
Injured on 7/19/2019 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/20/2020 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for entire career...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Atlanta on 2/13/2021 (Going to ATL: P Louis Rickman, P Carlos Valderrama. Going to STL: P Marc Jenkins, 2B Rene Espitia)...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Released by Atlanta on 4/26/2022...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/20/2023 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Released by Seattle on 4/11/2023...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/14/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $800,000 per year...
